text: If I'd known what it would be like I'd sooner have married a parson." He kissed her. "Parsons work on Sundays," he said."They're worse off than submariners. You ought to have married that fat stockbroker chap and shared him with his three mistresses. Anyway it might be much worse. Pericles is a Portsmouth boat. She spends longer in harbour than any other submarine.
